name: Bottom Navigation Bar
description: Navigation at the bottom with 3–5 main app sections for quick access.

name: Card Component
description: A container to display grouped content like product details, user info, or articles.

name: Search Bar
description: Input field for searching products, users, or content. Often includes a filter button.

name: Product / Shopping Card
description: Specialized card with product image, name, price, and an 'Add to Cart' button.

name: List Item
description: A compact row with icon, text, and an optional action button. Used in lists, settings, chats.

name: Modal / Bottom Sheet
description: Overlay that shows additional details or actions without leaving the current screen.

name: Loading Indicator
description: Spinner or skeleton loader to indicate that data is being fetched.

name: Order Summary Card
description: Displays cart items with quantity, price breakdown, and total amount.

name: Button (Primary & Secondary)
description: Call-to-action buttons like 'Buy Now', 'Confirm Order', styled consistently.
